00017 #define BT_GENERIC_6DOF_SPRING_CONSTRAINT_H

00020 #include "LinearMath/btVector3.h"
00021 #include "btTypedConstraint.h"
00022 #include "btGeneric6DofConstraint.h"

00024 #ifdef BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00025 #define btGeneric6DofSpringConstraintData2              btGeneric6DofSpringConstraintDoubleData2
00026 #define btGeneric6DofSpringConstraintDataName   "btGeneric6DofSpringConstraintDoubleData2"
00027 #else
00028 #define btGeneric6DofSpringConstraintData2              btGeneric6DofSpringConstraintData
00029 #define btGeneric6DofSpringConstraintDataName   "btGeneric6DofSpringConstraintData"
00030 #endif //BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION

00044 ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(class) btGeneric6DofSpringConstraint : public btGeneric6DofConstraint
00045 {
00046 protected:
00047         bool            m_springEnabled[6];
00048         btScalar        m_equilibriumPoint[6];
00049         btScalar        m_springStiffness[6];
00050         btScalar        m_springDamping[6]; // between 0 and 1 (1 == no damping)
00051         void init();
00052         void internalUpdateSprings(btConstraintInfo2* info);
00053 public: 
00054         
00055         BT_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00056         
00057     btGeneric6DofSpringConstraint(btRigidBody& rbA, btRigidBody& rbB, const btTransform& frameInA, const btTransform& frameInB ,bool useLinearReferenceFrameA);
00058     btGeneric6DofSpringConstraint(btRigidBody& rbB, const btTransform& frameInB, bool useLinearReferenceFrameB);
00059         void enableSpring(int index, bool onOff);
00060         void setStiffness(int index, btScalar stiffness);
00061         void setDamping(int index, btScalar damping);
00062         void setEquilibriumPoint(); // set the current constraint position/orientation as an equilibrium point for all DOF
00063         void setEquilibriumPoint(int index);  // set the current constraint position/orientation as an equilibrium point for given DOF
00064         void setEquilibriumPoint(int index, btScalar val);
00065 
00066         bool isSpringEnabled(int index) const
00067         {
00068             return m_springEnabled[index];
00069         }
00070 
00071         btScalar getStiffness(int index) const
00072         {
00073             return m_springStiffness[index];
00074         }
00075 
00076         btScalar getDamping(int index) const
00077         {
00078             return m_springDamping[index];
00079         }
00080 
00081         btScalar getEquilibriumPoint(int index) const
00082         {
00083             return m_equilibriumPoint[index];
00084         }
00085 
00086         virtual void setAxis( const btVector3& axis1, const btVector3& axis2);
00087 
00088         virtual void getInfo2 (btConstraintInfo2* info);
00089 
00090         virtual int     calculateSerializeBufferSize() const;
00092         virtual const char*     serialize(void* dataBuffer, btSerializer* serializer) const;
00093 
00094 };
00095 
00096 
00097 struct btGeneric6DofSpringConstraintData
00098 {
00099         btGeneric6DofConstraintData     m_6dofData;
00100         
00101         int                     m_springEnabled[6];
00102         float           m_equilibriumPoint[6];
00103         float           m_springStiffness[6];
00104         float           m_springDamping[6];
00105 };
00106 
00107 struct btGeneric6DofSpringConstraintDoubleData2
00108 {
00109         btGeneric6DofConstraintDoubleData2      m_6dofData;
00110         
00111         int                     m_springEnabled[6];
00112         double          m_equilibriumPoint[6];
00113         double          m_springStiffness[6];
00114         double          m_springDamping[6];
00115 };
00116 
00117 
00118 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       int     btGeneric6DofSpringConstraint::calculateSerializeBufferSize() const
00119 {
00120         return sizeof(btGeneric6DofSpringConstraintData2);
00121 }
00122 
00124 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       const char*     btGeneric6DofSpringConstraint::serialize(void* dataBuffer, btSerializer* serializer) const
00125 {
00126         btGeneric6DofSpringConstraintData2* dof = (btGeneric6DofSpringConstraintData2*)dataBuffer;
00127         btGeneric6DofConstraint::serialize(&dof->m_6dofData,serializer);
00128 
00129         int i;
00130         for (i=0;i<6;i++)
00131         {
00132                 dof->m_equilibriumPoint[i] = m_equilibriumPoint[i];
00133                 dof->m_springDamping[i] = m_springDamping[i];
00134                 dof->m_springEnabled[i] = m_springEnabled[i]? 1 : 0;
00135                 dof->m_springStiffness[i] = m_springStiffness[i];
00136         }
00137         return btGeneric6DofSpringConstraintDataName;
00138 }
